item.title: 7 Data Points That Show How Consumer Sentiment is Shifting
item.description: Sixty-five percent of Americans think we’re currently in a recession. They’re wrong.

item.title: Looming Over Two Court Cases Is a Single Question: Can Elon Musk Be Trusted?
item.description: Both court cases relate to Elon Musk’s car company, Tesla, and its Autopilot technology.

item.title: Workplace Injuries Cost Nearly $60 Billion a Year. Here’s What Small Business Owners Need to Know
item.description: Injuries at work can hurt your bottom line, but reviewing your company’s safety measures can make them less frequent.

item.title: Skims Expands Its Sports Reach Thanks to a Partnership With This $160-Million League
item.description: The women’s volleyball league LOVB has attracted the attention of Kim Kardashian’s $4-billion shapewear brand.
